params._pubkeys: bytes[] memory The pubkeys of the validators to activate boosts for.

params._amount: The amount of reward tokens to add as incentives
params._rewardsToken: The address of the token being added as incentives
params._stakingToken: The address of the staking token associated with the vault

addReward(address,address,uint256).details: Only callable by governance when contract is initialized

params._rewardsToken: The address of the token to be added as a reward
params._stakingToken: The address of the staking token associated with the vault

params._validators: Validator[] memory The validators to add.

params._token: address The token to claim fees in

params._delegatee: address The address to delegate votes to

params.pubkeys: bytes[] memory The pubkeys of the validators to remove boost from.

params.i: The index of the fee rate

returns._0: The BGT balance held by this address

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._tokens: address[] memory The addresses of the tokens to harvest in the contract.

returns.validators: Validator[] memory The set of infrared validators.

returns._0: _isValidator bool       Whether the validator is an infrared validator.
num uint256 The number of infrared validators in validator set.

params.token: address The token address for the accumulated fees

returns._0: uint256 The amount of accumulated fees

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._amts: uint128[] memory The amount of BGT to boost with.
params._pubkeys: bytes[] memory The pubkeys of the validators to queue boosts for.

queueDropBoosts(bytes[],uint128[]).details: Reverts if `user` does not have enough boosted balance to cover amount.

params.amounts: Amounts of BGT to remove from the queued drop boosts.
params.pubkeys: bytes[] memory The pubkeys of the validators to remove boost from.

params._pubkey: bytes                         The pubkey of the validator to queue the cutting board for
params._startBlock: uint64                        The start block for reward weightings
params._weights: IBeraChef.Weight[] calldata   The weightings used when distributor calls chef to distribute validator rewards

params._amount: The amount of the token to recover
params._to: The address to receive the recovered tokens
params._token: The address of the token to recover

params._asset: address The address of the staking asset that the vault is for.
params._to: address The address to send the tokens to.
params._token: address The address of the token to recover.

registerVault(address).details: Infrared.sol must be admin over MINTER_ROLE on InfraredBGT to grant minter role to deployed vault

params._asset: The address of the asset, such as a specific LP token

returns.vault: The address of the newly created InfraredVault contract

params._pubkeys: bytes[] memory The pubkeys of the validators to remove.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params._current: bytes The pubkey of the validator to replace.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

rewardsDuration().details: Used as gloabl variabel to set the rewards duration for all new reward tokens on InfraredVaults

returns.duration: uint256 The reward duration period, in seconds

setRed(address).details: Infrared must be granted MINTER_ROLE on RED to set the address

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.
